metadata.title: CVE-2020-26566 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Denial of Service condition in Motion-Project Motion 3.2 through 4.3.1allows remote unauthenticated users to cause a webu.c segmentation faultand kill the main process via a crafted HTTP request.

criterions.comment: motion: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
